title: Emmerdale star Jurell Carter has been 'hurt' by 'fan hate'
text:
It takes a brave actor to come between a soap power couple – while every couple in soap has to endure trials and tribulations, the characters that cause the rift can often come in for a tough time on social media from passionate fans and Emmerdale’s Jurell Carter has admitted that he found it hard to adjust to at first.

As Nate Robinson has an affair with Moira Dingle (Natalie J Robb), it seems likely that she and Cain (Jeff Hordley) are heading for a split – and it isn’t sitting well with Coira fans, who have only started getting used to their faves being reunited a short while ago.

Speaking about the backlash, Jurell told The Daily Star: ‘When I first started I found it quite hurtful at times, especially when the lines were blurred and it became a bit personal. Now I’ve made the ­decision not to even look as I find it’s just best to get on with my job. But it’s not all been negative, I’ve had some really lovely messages, and people sending me their drawings of Nate.’

With Nate being his first high profile acting role of this nature, another thing he has found awkward is the sex scenes that have been demanded of his character and Moira – affectionately known to some as ‘Mucky Moira’.

He shared: ‘It’s been full-on since I started. I’d done a few bits and pieces but Emmerdale is my first big TV role. My mum and late grandmother always watched Emmerdale so it was pretty daunting coming in.

‘And not only was I new to the show, but I’d not really done any intimate scenes before. I won’t lie – a lot of the time I’ve been overwhelmed by them. And you don’t even feel that sexy doing them. You have so many people around you, and the boom operators who can hear every little sound you make when you’re kissing. It’s not the sexiest when you’re doing it.’

And even less sexy tonight is the potential fate awaiting Nate, Moira and Cain as the boat they are all scrapping on explodes. Will they all survive?

Emmerdale continues on Tuesday 22nd October at 7pm on ITV.

description: Fans have not taken kindly to Nate's affair with Moira.
